pages.text: $(li)Bucket is a item that can be used to contain different liquids and even some creatures inside of them.

$(li)You can save Water, Lava and Milk in its interior.$(br)$(li)To use a Bucket, just right click pointing in the specific liquid while you are holding an Empty Bucket on your hand.$(br)$(li)Depending of the liquid, you will obtain a $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/milk_bucket)Bucket of Milk$(/l), $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/lava_bucket)Bucket of Lava$(/l), or $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/water_bucket)Bucket of Water$(/l).

$(li)$(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/slime)Slimes$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/bat)Bats$(/l) can be saved inside of a Empty bucket.$(br)$(li)To do this you need hold the Bucket on your hand and right click to one of those creatures to save it in its interior.$(br)$(li)Then you can release it following the same process.
